effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.

short_effect.x-y: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.

flavor_text.x-y: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
